tabId.description: The ID of the tab being inspected. This ID may be used with chrome.tabs.* API.

functions.name: eval
functions.description: Evaluates a JavaScript expression in the context of the main frame of the inspected page. The expression must evaluate to a JSON-compliant object, otherwise an exception is thrown.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: An expression to evaluate.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A function called when evaluation completes.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result of evaluation.

parameters.name: isException
parameters.description: Set if an exception was caught while evaluating the expression

functions.name: reload
functions.description: Reloads the inspected page, optionally setting override for the user agent string.

parameters.name: userAgent
parameters.description: A user agent override string.

types.description: A panel within Web Inspector UI that has sidebars.

functions.name: createSidebarPane
functions.description: Creates a pane within panel's sidebar.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A text that is displayed in sidebar caption.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A callback invoked when sidebar is created.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: An ExtensionSidebarPane object for created sidebar pane.

events.name: onSelectionChanged
events.description: Fired when an object is selected in the panel.

types.description: Represents a panel created by extension.

events.name: onSearch
events.description: Fired upon a search action (start of a new search, search result navigation or search being canceled).

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Type of search action being performed.

parameters.name: queryString
parameters.description: Query string (only for 'performSearch').

types.description: A sidebar created by the extension.

functions.name: setHeight
functions.description: Sets the height of the sidebar.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: A CSS-like size specification, e.g. '10px' or '12pt'.

functions.name: setExpression
functions.description: Sets an expression that is evaluated within the inspected page. The result is displayed in the sidebar pane.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: An expression to be evaluated in context of the inspected page. JavaScript objects and DOM nodes are displayed in an expandable tree similar to the console/watch.

parameters.name: rootTitle
parameters.description: An optional title for the root of the expression tree.

functions.name: setObject
functions.description: Sets a JSON-compliant object to be displayed in the sidebar pane.

parameters.name: jsonObject
parameters.description: An object to be displayed in context of the inspected page. Evaluated in the context of the caller (API client).

parameters.name: rootTitle
parameters.description: An optional title for the root of the expression tree.

functions.name: setPage
functions.description: Sets an HTML page to be displayed in the sidebar pane.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A URL of an extension page to display within the sidebar.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title that is displayed under the extension icon in the toolbar.

parameters.name: iconURL
parameters.description: A URL of the toolbar icon.

parameters.name: pageURL
parameters.description: A URL of the page that represents this panel.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A function that is called upon request completion.

parameters.name: panel
parameters.description: An ExtensionPanel object representing the created panel.

types.description: Represents a network request for a document resource (script, image etc). See HAR Specification for reference.

functions.name: getContent
functions.description: Returns content of the response body.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A function that is called upon request completion.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Content of the response body (potentially encoded).

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: Empty if content is not encoded, encoding name otherwise. Currently, only base64 supported.

functions.name: getHAR
functions.description: Returns HAR archive that contains all known network requests.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A function that is called upon request completion.

parameters.name: har
parameters.description: A HAR archive. See HAR specification for details.

events.name: onRequestFinished
events.description: Fired when a network request is finished and all request data are available.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Description of a network request in the form of a HAR entry. See HAR specification for details.

events.name: onNavigated
events.description: Fired when the inspected window navigates to a new page.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the new page.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: A display name for the category.

parameters.name: resultCount
parameters.description: The expected number of audit results in the category.

events.name: onAuditStarted
events.description: Fired when the audit is started, if the category is enabled -- the extension is expected to begin executing audit rules.

types.description: A value returned from one of the formatters (a URL, code snippet etc), to be passed to createResult or addChild.
A collection of audit results for current run of the audit category.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: A concise, high-level description of audit rule result.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A detailed description of what the displayName means.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: A subtree that appears under added result that may provide additional details on the violations found.

functions.name: createResult
functions.description: Creates a result node that may be user as details parameters to addResult.

parameters.name: content ...
parameters.description: Either string or formatted values returned by one of the AuditResult formatters (URL, snippet etc). If multiple arguments are passed, these will be concatenated into a single node.

functions.name: done
functions.description: Signals the WebInspector Audits panel that the run of this category is over. Normally the run completes automatically when a number of added top-level results is equal to that declared when AuditCategory was created.

functions.name: createURL
functions.description: Render passed value as a URL in the Audits panel

parameters.name: href
parameters.description: A URL that will appear as the href value on the resulting link.

parameters.name: displayText
parameters.description: A text that will appear to the user.

functions.name: createSnippet
functions.description: Render passed text as a code snippet in the Audits panel.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Snippet text.

Severity.description: A class that contains possible values for audit result severities.

expanded.description: Whether the node is expanded by default.

types.description: A node in the audit result tree. Displays some content and optionally has children node.

functions.name: addChild
functions.description: Adds another child node to this node.

parameters.name: content ...
parameters.description: Either string or formatted values returned by one of the AuditResult formatters (URL, snippet etc). If multiple arguments are passed, these will be concatenated into a single node.

expanded.description: If set, the subtree will always be expanded.
